thoughts: Tells themself they're going to kill r_c and take their position in c_n
Wants vengeance on their past clan
Is starting to hear voices from their past Clanmates
Crowns themself the ruler of all rogues
Is eating kittypet kibble
Stole some random kittypet's food
Is eating dog food they found
Is putting their own scent on c_n's clearly marked borders
Regrets nothing from their past Clan life
Showing off their scars to r_c
Wants to show r_c in c_n a whole new world as a rogue
Is waiting to ambush r_c in c_n
Wishes the other rogues would leave them alone
Snarls at any cat that comes near
Wanders off on their own
Has been going missing quite a lot lately
Sniffs for their next meal
Wonders if they can find a warm place to sleep tonight
Was chased by a fox recently
Wishes they were in a warm nest
Wonders what it's like to live with Twolegs
Is struggling to survive on their own
Is fighting with another rogue over food
Laughed at the thought of dead cats 'watching over' c_n
Debates if their previous Clan was fair casting them out
Debates if they should join c_n
Is currently trying to figure out how to catch a bird
Is setting up a pile of thorns to catch a cat off guard
Wishes they still had their family around
Has been teaching themselves how to hunt
Misses their friends
Regrets their actions
Wonders what being in a Clan is like
Is spending a long time thinking about a cool rogue name
Hisses at a missed catch
Thinking if they should build their own Clan
Is hoping they can find something to fill their belly tonight
Licks at an old, aching scar in an attempt to soothe it
Was almost found by a c_n patrol
Is lurking in c_n territory
Thinks about finding some Twolegs to help them in their old age
Thinks their joints are aching too much to hunt today
Wonders if they can carry on
